reviewText: This set of Spaghetti westerns contains some classics of the genre in decent quality image (Massacre Time),(Light the fuse, Sartana is coming), (Dig your grave, Sabata is coming), (Sartana killed them all), and (Holy Water Joe). I enjoyed all the westerns on this set except for "Buffalo Bill" which was a poor blurry print of the film, and "Little Rita" which was like a musical comedy that wasn't quite my cup of tea. Besides these 2, the rest of the films on here are quality Spaghetti Westerns with some popular stars within the genre like Gianni Garko, Terence Hill, and Fernando Sancho. Lots of gunfights, fistfights, action stunts, fun story plots, and atmospheric settings. If you are collector of the films, and are looking for a good priced set with some classics on it, this is another set to buy!
summary: A nice collection of Spaghetti westerns!

reviewText: the films in this box set offer good value and the picture quality varies from fair to very good a good buy for fans of the genre
Title: N/A

reviewText: Worth the price for Light The Fuse alone starring the ultra cool Gianni Garko he has become my favorite Italian actor in I think the best overall series in the spaghetti west ,his character is always one step ahead of everyone else ,has cool gadgets and never goes through the captured/tortured plot point of just about every other main character in Italian films,hes like the James Bond of spaghetti westerns ,the Sartana films are very action packed ,maybe a little hard to follow at times but who cares when the action never stops,I am surprised that they are not more popular ,people do not know what they are missing.P.S. all of the best Sartana films are available on the Sartana Complete Saga for a very low price right here on Amazon ,well worth it.

reviewText: I enjoy watching more adult westerns at times and have found this set to be varied and enjoyable. It gives you a greater selection for about the cost of one movie.
summary: if you like more adult westerns
Title: N/A

reviewText: Got this set for Django but found out it wasn't really Django at all. Still, all these movies were good. Again more duplication but the new movies that I did find on here were really good. Really loved Dig Your Grave...Sabata Is Coming! In that one Sabata is actually the bad guy or else this is his true nature in the rest of his films. Not sure as I haven't seen the Sabata films yet. This one was my favorite of the 8 pack with Light The Fuse...Sartana Is Coming standing as a close second. So again, another good buy and highly recommended if you really like Spaghetti Westerns.
Title: N/A
